professional_summary: I'm Technically-proficient engineer with a strong work ethic, aiming for a challenging career in cell process engineering, particularly in lithium-ion cell testing. Seeking a role that leverages my hands-on experience in testing, validation, and troubleshooting, ensuring high-performance cells aligned with industry standards.

engineering: Environment Testing of Cells (Both Cell and Pack Level)
analysis: Discharge Curves at various C rate and environment

responsibilities: Developed and executed test plans for performance, cycle life, and safety validation of lithium-ion cells.
Defined critical test parameters including C-rates, voltage limits, temperature ranges, and current profiles.
Conducted hands-on tests on capacity, self-discharge, and cycle life.
Analyzed charge/discharge profiles, identified anomalies, and assessed degradation patterns.
Evaluated battery pack at High temperature, low temperature, vibration, bump and transportation condition as per MIL strandard.
impact: Ensured high-performance testing aligned with global compliance standards.
Improved battery reliability by performing detailed root cause analysis (RCA) and implementing corrective actions.
Contributed to continuous improvement of battery pack at low temperature using inhouse developed Polymide blanket.

projects.title: Sodium-ion Battery Performance using NASICON-type Cathode: Influence of Synthetic Route
projects.description: Investigated how different synthesis methods affect the electrochemical performance of NASICON-type Na3V2(PO4)3 cathodes in sodium-ion batteries.
impact: Identified optimal synthesis routes for enhanced battery performance
Provided insights for future cathode material development

projects.title: Nanostructured Layered Transition Metal Oxide as a Cathode Material for Sodium-ion Battery
projects.description: Developed and characterized nanostructured layered transition metal oxides to evaluate their potential as cathode materials in sodium-ion batteries using lyophilization synthesis.
impact: Demonstrated electrochemical performance via coin cell compared to other layered transition metal oxide compounds
Provided a deeper understanding of structure-property relationships

achievements: Training program on Industrial Process Safety Instrumentation.
PDC course on Electric and Hybrid Electric Vehicles.
Participated in National Level Conference on Recent Green Energy Trends (2022).
Secured third prize in Pondicherry Zonal level Cricket tournament.
Participated in National Service Scheme (NSS) activities in college.
Active participation in college Literary Club events.
Attended seminar conducted by Renewable Energy Agency Puducherry (REAP).

publications.title: Sodium-ion battery using a NASICON-type Na3V2(PO4)3 cathode: quantification of diffusive and capacitive Na+ charge storage
publications.co-authors: Sivasubramaniam Ragul, Annadoure Prabakaran, Elayaperumal Sujithkrishnan, Kalidoss Kannadasan
